thread.title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Local Black Stars to host Ivory Coast at the Baba Yara Stadium
thread.title_full: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Local Black Stars to host Ivory Coast at the Baba Yara Stadium

title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: Local Black Stars to host Ivory Coast at the Baba Yara Stadium
text:
19:40 CET 2016 CHAN qualifier: Local Black Stars to host Ivory Coast at the Baba Yara Stadium - www.ghanasoccernet.com Local Black Stars at training. 
GHANASoccernet.com can confirm Ghana's 2016 CHAN final qualifying round first leg tie against Ivory Coast will be played at the Baba Yara Stadium in Kumasi. 
The local Black Stars have been preparing in Obuasi the last two weeks for crucial tie. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
